attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Do away with means testing on Carer's Allowances.  We should not be penalised especially if you are self employed and work from home.  You choose to do this so you can look after your severely disabled loved one.  The state would have to pay much more if they looked after Profound and Multiple Learning Disabilities children or adults.

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
